bike.description: Specialized Smartweld E5, hydroformed aluminum tubing, 1-3/8" lower bearing, OSBB

components.description: Specialized Tarmac, FACT full-carbon monocoque fork, carbon steerer and crown for 1-3/8" lower bearing
1-1/8" upper and 1-3/8" lower Cr-Mo cartridge bearings integrated, w/ headset, 8mm cone spacer, w/ 20mm of spacers
Chainstay protector, derailleur hanger, clear coat, owner's manual
